site_name:
Croydon College Annexe 
Barclay Road
Croydon
CR9 1DX
description: Demolition of existing building and redevelopment of the Croydon College Annex site to provide a new building with ground and first floor creative and cultural enterprise centre (previous Use Class D1/B1, new use Class E/F1) with ancillary exhibition space, and residential units (Class C3) above. Associated works include new landscaped public pedestrian route running through the site from north to south, private and communal amenity space for residents including play space, basement car parking and cycle parking, and temporary landscaping on southern part of the site.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               The plans show a part 12, part 4 storey building, providing 93 flats above a cultural and creative industries enterprise centre.
decision_conditions: Refuse store and collection management p
Use of ground floor as CCIEC
Meanwhile use of ground floor units

Access routes and signage down the ramp
